original: intros m k x Hmap Hsucc. unfold ne. unfold B. destruct (eq_dim_dec k zero) as [Hkzero | Hknotzero]. - simpl. rewrite Z.add_1_r. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite if_false. + rewrite Z.add_0_r. reflexivity. + intro Hnot. apply Hknotzero. apply Hnot.
